body: My God this is what I have been looking for years, a doujin about legal loli acting as a sadist, never mind the ending. Art is great, seen better but I love that body proportions. And this fellatio was so refreshing after seeing so many just go straight to deep throat, it gets so boring that I can't help and just skip them. The words picked for Flan are a masterpiece, last line alone made me cum, also a great work from the translator. I wish there was a display of hers superior strenght as a vampire but the kiss with semen we incredibly disgusting and I love it. For me this short 15 pages doujin is truly a masterpiece.
Little girl act or is she truly a sadist
